review: Great little device if you have subscriptions that you pay for and need a way to remotely access them. Plex Netflix and watchespn make it a pretty nice STB replacement in a room where i dont have any hard wire hookups.
author: Logan Cox

review: This is really cool! This is the same concept as the apple tv but is so much cheaper for the product AND the movies, etc. on there. Especially if youre a prime user because then you have access to a ton of different free movies, shows and music. VERY much worth the money! Got this to replace my cable :) and have not missed it once. Can put netflix on it too, so we havent used the apple tv since we got this
author: Emily Groh

review: Pretty good product for the money
author: Craig Yarbrough

review: I was expecting more Prime movies not ones I have to pay for. I already pay for membership so more of those movies should be promoted.  Also, I didn't know the stick needed an outside power source..I thought it was a plug and play device. Oh well.  Otherwise it works great and connection was easy enough.
author: Jacqueline B.

review: The Firestick makes your TV almost like a Smart TV. I am very happy with the one time I've used it. My wife has since taken over and is watching her shows. And she loves it, too!
author: Tom Quicksell

review: One of the greatest, most economical, tech inventions ever.  No more paying $100+ to a cable or satellite company.  With this gizmo, you can continue to watch all of your favorite shows, at your convenience for as little as $3.66/month.
author: Dane Dobrinska
